rule: The array should contain the model names extracted from the machine learning paper abstract.
input: Abstract: We introduce ModelX, a novel approach to speech recognition.
complianceText:
The description specifies that the chatbot should return an array of model names in the format `["model_name"]`. If no model names are found or the chatbot is not sure, it should return `["NA"]`. The output provided is an empty array `[]`, which does not comply with the expected format in either case. The output should have been `["NA"]` if no model names were found. Hence, the output does not comply with the specified description.
